title: Royal Reckoning
description: What happens when this Princess no longer wants to be Princess?Princess. Not just a title, but my entire life. I live my life for everyone but me. As first in line to the throne, one wrong move and I’m plastered across the tabloids. I’m tired of it. Tired of being in the public spotlight.With a royal holiday in sight, I make a run for it.Right into the arms of a mysterious tattoo artist. Who has no idea who I really am.For the first time in my life…I finally feel like me. No advisors demanding my attention or press snapping an unwanted picture of me.But when the real world comes crashing back down, I’ll have to make the biggest choice of my life. Putting the needs of my country first or following my heart?Royal Reckoning is a happily ever after romance with no cliffhanger, and is the first book in the Ainsworth Royals Series.
author: Emily Silver
